msbt.message: Do you remember my favorite purse? It's by that designer whose name I can't pronounce Never mind. The important thing is, I can't find it anywhere.
Should I help search?
Aww, cheer up.
I'm afraid I'm at my wit's end, . I can't find my favorite purse anywhere!
I'll help you look for it.
You poor thing.
Oh, it's just awful. I dropped my very favorite bag somewhere on the island.
I'll go look for it.
I'm sorry to hear that.
Oh my! Oh dear! I think I dropped one of my most beloved makeup bags somewhere on the island
I'll find it for you.
I'm sorry to hear that.
This is just awful. I've gone and lost the novel that I JUST bought!
Want me to look?
Really? Oh no!
Oh bother! I've gone and left the new novel I was readingsomewhere. I'm just dying to finish it too.
I'll help you look.
Aww, I'm sorry.
Where on earth did my planner go to? I've been searching high and low, but can't find it anywhere
Want me to look?
Uh-oh! I'm sorry.
This can't be happening! My precious planner has gone missing! I've looked everywhere, but no luck.
I'll find it for you.
Sorry to hear that.
Oh, that's so nice of you! Do let me know when you manage to track it down, won't you?
Well, thank you! That's a big help. I hope you have better luck than me.
Really? Thank you! Meanwhile, I'll go retrace my steps one more time
Aww, thank you. You're such a dear for helping me out. I'm sure we'll find it in no time!
Yes, I suppose I should just chin up. These things have a way of turning up eventually
Yes, well, thank you. It has to be somewhere, doesn't it? I'll keep on looking
It's really one of a kind, so I hope it's not lost forever. I guess I'll get back to searching for it
Yes, well, I suppose it's all my fault. I'll just keep walking and looking
Well, if you're sure you don't mind!
Really? Oh, that would be such a help.
Wow, really? Well, with you helping out, I'm sure we'll find it in no time!
Oh, thank you! Please let me know right away if you find it.
Yes, well I suppose I'd better take another look through my house
Thank you. I'm sure it will eventually turn up somewhere
Thank you for your concern. I haven't given up hope yet!
Well, they say you always find lost things when you stop thinking about them, right? To that end, I'm off to distract myself by .
Oh, hello, ! Sorry, I was just looking for my makeup bag I must have dropped it around here somewhere, but I just can't seem to find it.
I'll help find it!
Sorry, haven't seen it.
Today is simply not my day. I set down my favorite makeup bag this morning and now I can't find it! It's full of the most fabulous cosmeticsand I just bought them too.
Want me to look for it?
That's a shame...
Would you really? Oh, that's so above and beyond. Please and thank you!
No, of course you haven't. It seems to have vanished into the ether.Well, if you find ityou know where I am.
Would I?! <10_4 />Yes, yes, a million times yes! Oh, thank you so much!With both of us looking, we might just stand a chance.
You can say that again. Well, I sure hope it turns up somewhere, no matter WHO finds it
Oh dear I seem to have dropped my planner somewhere, and I haven't the slightest clue where!My whole life is in there. What am I going to do?!
I'll find it for you!
I'm sure it'll turn up.

Well, I think it's finally time to admit that my planner is lost. I was holding out hope, but I think it's truly gone. I turned my home inside out to no avail, so I think I must have dropped it outside somewhere I don't know what I'll do without it. I can't even remember my own birthday without consulting it
Let me look for it!
Sorry to hear that.
Are you serious? Oh, if you can find it, I'd be incredibly grateful. Thank you, !
Well, thanks for trying to cheer me up. I can really use it right now
Really? I'd just about given up hope, but I suppose a fresh set of eyes couldn't hurt. Thank you!

Yes, well, thank you. I suppose I'm just going to have to remember what my plans for today were on my own. Was I going to do yogaor relax by the beach? Perhaps I was going to go shopping for a new planner?
